tables.name: LoanContractPayoffRequest
tables.description: A Loan Contract Payoff Request is a request from the borrower to a lender (financial institution) to pay off a loan contract.

columns.name: UUID
columns.description: A UUID is a  universal unique identifier of a LoanContractPayoffRequest. Example: 01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef

columns.name: ID
columns.description: An ID is an identifier of the LoanContractPayoffRequest. Example: 71

columns.name: LoanContractUUID
columns.description: An internal ID of Loan Contract. Example: 01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef

columns.name: ChangeStateID
columns.description: Identifies a change state. Example: 20200309121401.6154150

columns.name: LifeCycleStatusCode
columns.description: A LifeCycleStatusCode is the coded representation of the life cycle status of a LoanContractPayoffRequest. Example: 5

columns.name: LifeCycleStatusName
columns.description: Name of a LifeCycleStatusCode. Example: Completed

columns.name: ReasonCode
columns.description: A ReasonCode is the coded representation of the reason for the payoff. Example: 1

columns.name: ReasonName
columns.description: Is the name of the reason code Example: Borrower Decision

columns.name: CancellationReasonCode
columns.description: A CancellationReasonCode is the coded representation of the reason for the cancellation of a loan contract payoff request. Example: 1

columns.name: CancellationReasonName
columns.description: Is the name of a CancellationReasonCode. Example: Borrower Decision

columns.name: LoanPaymentPlanChangeTypeCode
columns.description: A LoanPaymentPlanChangeTypeCode is a coded representation of the type of a LoanPaymentPlanChange. Example: 1

columns.name: LoanPaymentPlanChangeTypeName
columns.description: Is the name of a LoanPaymentPlanChangeTypeCode. Example: Without Term End Change

columns.name: ValueDate
columns.description: A ValueDate is the value date of the payoff. Example: 2017-04-13

columns.name: ExpectedPaymentDate
columns.description: An ExpectedPaymentDate is the date on which the payment to payoff of loan is expected. Example: 2017-04-13

columns.name: LastScheduledPaymentDate
columns.description: The date on which last scheduled payment is to be made before payoff. Example: 2017-04-13

columns.name: CompletionDate
columns.description: A Completion Date is the  date on which the loan contract payoff request is completed. Example: 2017-04-13

columns.name: DueDate
columns.description: A PayoffDueDate is the date on which the payoff  is due. Example: 2017-04-13

columns.name: FinalPaymentDate
columns.description: Indicates whether the bank account will be debited by the bank account prenote entry or not. Example: 2017-04-13

columns.name: NetAmount
columns.description: A NetAmount is the net amount of the loan contract payoff request.

columns.name: GrossAmount
columns.description: A GrossAmount is the gross amount of the loan contract payoff request

columns.name: DailyInterestAmount
columns.description: A DailyInterestAmount is the daily amount of the interest calculated for the value date of the loan contract payoff request.

columns.name: DailyInterestOnArrearsAmount
columns.description: A DailyInterestOnArrearsAmount is the daily amount of the interest on arrears calculated for the value date of the loan contract payoff request.

columns.name: ActivationChargeAmount
columns.description: An ActivationChargeAmount is the charge amount for activation.

columns.name: NewInstalmentAmount
columns.description: NewInstallmentAmount is the  installment amount after the LoanContractPayoff Request.

columns.name: ImmediateCompletionRequiredIndicator
columns.description: An ImmediateCompletionRequiredIndicator indicates whether immediate completion is required for a LoanContractPayoffRequest or not.

columns.name: FullPayoffRequiredIndicator
columns.description: A FullPayoffRequiredIndicator indicates whether a full payoff is required for a loan contract payoff or not.

columns.name: ActivationChargeWaiverRequestedIndicator
columns.description: Indicates whether a charge is applied for a activated loan contract payoff request or not.

columns.name: ImmediateCompletionChargeWaiverRequestedIndicator
columns.description: Indicates whether a charge is applied for immediate completion of  loan contract payoff request or not.

columns.name: EarlyRepaymentCompensationRequiredIndicator
columns.description: An EarlyRepaymentCompensationRequiredIndicator is an indicator of whether early repayment compensation is required or not.

columns.name: GrossAmountCalculationResult
columns.description: Gross Amount Calculation Result

columns.name: BusinessProcessChainAssignment
columns.description: Business Process Chain Assignment is the assignment of Loan Contract Payoff Request to a business process chain.

columns.name: PaymentTransactionInstruction
columns.description: A Payment Transaction Instruction is an instruction for payment transactions related to the loan contract.
